title: How to Make a Dream Cake

steps.headline: Take the bananas and strawberries and place them on a plate or cutting board.
steps.description: Thinly slice the bananas, one by one with the knife, making each one evenly cut. Halve the strawberries. Separately set aside the strawberries and bananas.

steps.headline: Dip the frosting spatula into the sweetened whipped cream.
steps.description: Using a rounded, smooth, gentle motion, spread the whipped cream onto the pie crust, enough to generously coat the inside layer.

steps.headline: Grasp each slice of banana gently with the thumb and index finger.
steps.description: Place them on top of the whipped cream to create a second inside layer.

steps.headline: Dot whipped cream in between the bananas, using a spoon, or the frosting spatula.
steps.description: Mark each place generously, and to taste.

steps.headline: Place the halved strawberries on the dots of whipped cream.
Sprinkle with nuts if you wish.
Spread the whipped cream on the top of the pie.
Top the dream cake with chopped nuts.
Freeze the pie for up to 30 minutes or more.
steps.description: Allow it to thaw, slightly, before serving slices.

text: Take the bananas and strawberries and place them on a plate or cutting board. Thinly slice the bananas, one by one with the knife, making each one evenly cut. Halve the strawberries. Separately set aside the strawberries and bananas. Dip the frosting spatula into the sweetened whipped cream. Using a rounded, smooth, gentle motion, spread the whipped cream onto the pie crust, enough to generously coat the inside layer. Grasp each slice of banana gently with the thumb and index finger. Place them on top of the whipped cream to create a second inside layer. Dot whipped cream in between the bananas, using a spoon, or the frosting spatula. Mark each place generously, and to taste. Place the halved strawberries on the dots of whipped cream.  Sprinkle with nuts if you wish.  Spread the whipped cream on the top of the pie.  Top the dream cake with chopped nuts. Drizzle chocolate syrup to taste. Freeze the pie for up to 30 minutes or more. Allow it to thaw, slightly, before serving slices. Finished.
